payload.name: monads-algebraic-effects
payload.title: Monads/algebraic effects: disciplined sequencing of side effects
payload.formal: effects are explicit; handlers interpret them; sequencing becomes structured.
payload.apm2_mapping: treat tool usage as effectful computation: requests are effect values; the kernel is the handler enforcing policy and budgets. This is how you prevent “agent prose” from being an implicit effect system.
